If you allow that, how would a server be able to d=
etermine the nature of the update (partial or complete) and perform its job=

For example, suppose that PUT was allowed to be partial:

--------------=
--
GET /mydog

200 OK

<dog>
    <status>happy</status>
    <favoriteToy>A =
red muppet</favoriteToy>
</dog>
----------------

Then:

----------------
P=
UT /mydog

<dog>
    <status>sleepy</status>
</dog>
----------------

Am I =
doing a partial update (just changing my dog's status), or a complete one (=
changing his status and removing an optional "favoriteToy" information) ?

Philippe
